text: maraṇam aṭainta oruvaṉai nām uyirppittu eḻuppiṉōm - iṉṉum avaṉukku ōr oḷiyaiyum koṭuttōm. Ataikkoṇṭu avaṉ maṉitarkaḷiṭaiyē naṭamāṭukiṟāṉ. Maṟṟoruvaṉ iruḷkaḷil cikkikkiṭakkiṟāṉ; ataiviṭṭu avaṉ veḷiyēṟavē muṭiyātu - ivviruvarum camamāvārā? Ivvāṟu kāḥpirkaḷukku avarkaḷ ceyyakkūṭiya (pāvac)ceyalkaḷ aḻakākkappaṭṭuḷḷaṉa
